Package com.brightcove.ssai.tracking.timed

Class TimedTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brightcove.ssai.tracking.timed.TimedTracker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TickerObserver, Tracker, TrackingConfigListener
    public class TimedTracker
extends java.lang.Object
implements Tracker, TickerObserver, TrackingConfigListener
    Class in charge of handling the timed tracking events.
